briefDescription: A type of work that a thread on a gpu may be able to do.
detailedDescription: A type of work that a thread on a gpu may be able to do.

values.name: draw
values.detailedDescription:
Rendering/drawing images.
This is different from making the drawn images visible on a window.

values.name: present
values.briefDescription: Sets what image is visible on a window.
values.detailedDescription: Sets what image is visible on a window.
